school_name: Nova Scotia Community College - Institute of Technology Campus
comments: Charlie knows what he\'s talking about! Awesome math teacher, always willing to help, and loves his dog! Also, hints a lot about going to the pub for beers, if only class could be taught there!

school_name: Nova Scotia Community College - Institute of Technology Campus
Nova Scotia Community College - Institute of Technology Campus
comments: I would not recommend him. He is friendly and super outgoing, however has trouble staying on track. He makes a great pal, but as a teacher he is very hard to follow

school_name: Nova Scotia Community College - Institute of Technology Campus
comments: He was a terrible teacher. If you want to learn Math DONT take his class. He talks too much, and tries to socialize more than teach. overall you\'d be bettre off being his buddy than his student!

school_name: Nova Scotia Community College - Institute of Technology Campus
comments: Charlie was my favourite instructor. I went into NSCC despising math, and he made it my favourite subject. He taught with such clarity. He was funny, nice, and respectful to all students, always trying to help everyone succeed. Amazing instructor!

school_name: Nova Scotia Community College - Institute of Technology Campus
comments: Charlie is the man, plain and simple. This guy will go out of his way to teach and make sure you learn the material, on top of that he is cool as hell to talk to. Did a great job for us in Arts&Science, hell of a great instructor.
